conbody.p: Single phase constructor is to push a pointer to the clean-up stack, and then complete its construction. It uses the macro CONSTRUCTORS_MAY_LEAVE that is necessary to ensure whether the cleanup is correctly handled in the event that a constructor may leave beneath a call to new(ELeave).
